scripts.dev: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fdba74" "php artisan serve --host=192.168.1.111 --port=8000" "php artisan queue:listen  --timeout=0 --tries=3" "php artisan reverb:start --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8010 --hostname=192.168.1.111" "vite --host 192.168.1.111" --names='server,queue,reverb,vite'
